I wrote "Getting started with Jekyll" on July 04, 2014. You can read more posts like it in tech.

I have no idea what I’m doing, so here’s a list of sources I used while getting this set up and ready to go.

*A guide to using Github Pages *How to run Jekyll on Windows *Jekyll From Scratch - Getting Started *Jekyll From Scratch - Core Architecture *Jekyll From Scratch - Extending Jekyll *Jekyll Docs *Markdown Syntax *You do not need a database for your contact form *Source for Tom Preston-Werner *Source for Tatey.com *Source for Jason Rudolph
